resources.string: List seems to be empty. Try to pull down to refresh or reload the app
Are you sure you want to delete current library?
Begin your authentication for %s contract. You can always go back to change the type
Welcome to Saas client app. Select the contract bellow to get going
Tap the button bellow to begin the process of pushing data to your cloud storage
If contract data is changed, we recommend to firstly delete the library and start fresh due to locally stored credentials, etc. which might cause problems if not correct.
Base URl must not be empty
App ID must not be empty
